{{Codepointer|r=Hexen|Spawn}} '''A_ShedShard'''
(''no parameter'')
Creates new {{Class|FrostMissile}}s if the calling actor's {{c|special2}} counter is greater than zero. The direction in which these new missiles will be spawned depend on {{c|special1}}, used as a flag array: *1: Left *2: Right *4: Up *8: Down If {{c|special1}} is 15, four new missiles will be created. In any case, the newly-created missiles will have their {{c|special2}} set to one less than the calling actor's, and their first argument set to 2 or 0 depending on whether the calling actor's {{c|special2}} is 3 or not. The spawned missiles share the calling actor's {{c|target}}. Other aspects depend on the spawned missile's direction: ;Left and right: :A new missile is created at the calling actor's position, going at a horizontal angle of 5Â° in the appropriate direction. The new missile's {{c|special1}} is set to only left or right, as appropriate. Its vertical velocity is the same as the calling actor's, but its horizontal velocity depends on the calling actor's {{c|special2}}, using this formula: ::''velocity = 20 + 2 * ({{c|special2}} - 1)'' ;Up and down: :A new missile is created eight map units above or below the calling actor. The new missile's {{c|special1}} is set to up or down as appropriate, as well as left and right if the calling actor's {{c|special2}} is an even number. Its vertical velocity is the same as the calling actor's, but its horizontal velocity depends on the calling actor's {{c|special2}}, using this formula: ::''velocity = 15 + 2 * ({{c|special2}} - 1)'' This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FrostMissile}} and derived classes.
